docs.text: TDEE App API Documentation Welcome to the documentation for the TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) App API. This API provides endpoints for managing users, activities, foods, profiles, daily data, and user foods. Quick Links Users Activities Foods Profiles Daily Data User Foods
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for the TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) App API. This API provides endpoints for managing users, activities, foods, profiles, daily data, and user foods.
docs.title: TDEE App API Documentation

docs.text: Users Activities Foods Profiles Daily Data User Foods
docs.title: Quick Links

docs.text: Activities The Activities section provides endpoints for managing activity information. List and Create Activities URL: /api/activities/ Method: GET (List Activities), POST (Create Activity) Retrieve, Update, and Delete Activity URL: /api/activities/{activity_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Activity), PUT (Update Activity), DELETE (Delete Activity) Example 1. Create activities URL: /api/activities/ Method: POST (Create Activity) Request: { "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } Success Responses: { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } 2. List activities URL: /api/activities/ Method: GET (List Activities) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "name": "Running", "met_value": 8.0 }, { "id": 2, "name": "Cycling", "met_value": 6.0 }, { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } ]
docs.title: Activities

docs.text: The Activities section provides endpoints for managing activity information.
docs.title: Activities

docs.text: URL: /api/activities/ Method: GET (List Activities), POST (Create Activity)
docs.title: List and Create Activities

docs.text: URL: /api/activities/{activity_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Activity), PUT (Update Activity), DELETE (Delete Activity)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete Activity

docs.text: URL: /api/activities/ Method: POST (Create Activity) Request: { "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } Success Responses: { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 }
docs.title: 1. Create activities

docs.text: URL: /api/activities/ Method: GET (List Activities) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "name": "Running", "met_value": 8.0 }, { "id": 2, "name": "Cycling", "met_value": 6.0 }, { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } ]
docs.title: 2. List activities

docs.text: Daily Data The Daily Data section provides endpoints for managing daily data related to user activities and calories. List and Create Daily Data URL: /api/daily-data/ Method: GET (List Daily Data), POST (Create Daily Data) Retrieve, Update, and Delete Daily Data URL: /api/daily-data/{dailydata_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Daily Data), PUT (Update Daily Data), DELETE (Delete Daily Data) Example URL: /api/daily-data/ Method: GET (List Daily Data) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "date": "2023-01-01", "activities": [ { "id": 1, "name": "Running", "met_value": 8.0 }, { "id": 2, "name": "Cycling", "met_value": 6.0 } ], "calories": 500 }, { "id": 2, "user": { "id": 2, "username": "jane", "first_name": "Jane", "last_name": "Doe" }, "date": "2023-01-02", "activities": [ { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } ], "calories": 300 } ]
docs.title: Daily Data

docs.text: The Daily Data section provides endpoints for managing daily data related to user activities and calories.
docs.title: Daily Data

docs.text: URL: /api/daily-data/ Method: GET (List Daily Data), POST (Create Daily Data)
docs.title: List and Create Daily Data

docs.text: URL: /api/daily-data/{dailydata_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Daily Data), PUT (Update Daily Data), DELETE (Delete Daily Data)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete Daily Data

docs.text: URL: /api/daily-data/ Method: GET (List Daily Data) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "date": "2023-01-01", "activities": [ { "id": 1, "name": "Running", "met_value": 8.0 }, { "id": 2, "name": "Cycling", "met_value": 6.0 } ], "calories": 500 }, { "id": 2, "user": { "id": 2, "username": "jane", "first_name": "Jane", "last_name": "Doe" }, "date": "2023-01-02", "activities": [ { "id": 3, "name": "Swimming", "met_value": 7.0 } ], "calories": 300 } ]
docs.title: Example

docs.text: Foods The Foods section provides endpoints for managing food information. List and Create Foods URL: /api/foods/ Method: GET (List Foods), POST (Create Food) Retrieve, Update, and Delete Food URL: /api/foods/{food_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Food), PUT (Update Food), DELETE (Delete Food)
docs.title: Foods

docs.text: The Foods section provides endpoints for managing food information.
docs.title: Foods

docs.text: URL: /api/foods/ Method: GET (List Foods), POST (Create Food)
docs.title: List and Create Foods

docs.text: URL: /api/foods/{food_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Food), PUT (Update Food), DELETE (Delete Food)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete Food

docs.text: Profiles The Profiles section provides endpoints for managing user profiles. List and Create Profiles URL: /api/profiles/ Method: GET (List Profiles), POST (Create Profile) Retrieve, Update, and Delete Profile URL: /api/profiles/{profile_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Profile), PUT (Update Profile), DELETE (Delete Profile)
docs.title: Profiles

docs.text: The Profiles section provides endpoints for managing user profiles.
docs.title: Profiles

docs.text: URL: /api/profiles/ Method: GET (List Profiles), POST (Create Profile)
docs.title: List and Create Profiles

docs.text: URL: /api/profiles/{profile_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve Profile), PUT (Update Profile), DELETE (Delete Profile)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete Profile

docs.text: User Foods The User Foods section provides endpoints for managing user-specific food consumption data. List and Create User Foods URL: /api/user-foods/ Method: GET (List User Foods), POST (Create User Food) Retrieve, Update, and Delete User Food URL: /api/user-foods/{userfood_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve User Food), PUT (Update User Food), DELETE (Delete User Food) Example 1. Retrieve User Food URL: /api/user-foods/1/ Method: GET (Retrieve User Food) Success Responses: { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "food": { "id": 1, "name": "Apple", "calories": 95, "protein": 0.5, "carbs": 25.0, "fat": 0.3 }, "date": "2023-01-01", "amount": 2.0 } 2. Update User Food URL: /api/user-foods/1/ Method: PUT (Update User Food) Request: { "amount": 2.5 } Success Responses: { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "food": { "id": 1, "name": "Apple", "calories": 95, "protein": 0.5, "carbs": 25.0, "fat": 0.3 }, "date": "2023-01-01", "amount": 2.5 }
docs.title: User Foods

docs.text: The User Foods section provides endpoints for managing user-specific food consumption data.
docs.title: User Foods

docs.text: URL: /api/user-foods/ Method: GET (List User Foods), POST (Create User Food)
docs.title: List and Create User Foods

docs.text: URL: /api/user-foods/{userfood_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve User Food), PUT (Update User Food), DELETE (Delete User Food)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete User Food

docs.text: URL: /api/user-foods/1/ Method: GET (Retrieve User Food) Success Responses: { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "food": { "id": 1, "name": "Apple", "calories": 95, "protein": 0.5, "carbs": 25.0, "fat": 0.3 }, "date": "2023-01-01", "amount": 2.0 }
docs.title: 1. Retrieve User Food

docs.text: URL: /api/user-foods/1/ Method: PUT (Update User Food) Request: { "amount": 2.5 } Success Responses: { "id": 1, "user": { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, "food": { "id": 1, "name": "Apple", "calories": 95, "protein": 0.5, "carbs": 25.0, "fat": 0.3 }, "date": "2023-01-01", "amount": 2.5 }
docs.title: 2. Update User Food

docs.text: Users The Users section provides endpoints for managing user information. List and Create Users URL: /users/ Method: GET (List Users), POST (Create User) Retrieve, Update, and Delete User URL: /api/users/{user_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve User), PUT (Update User), DELETE (Delete User) Example URL: /api/users/ Method: GET (Retrieve User) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, { "id": 2, "username": "jane", "first_name": "Jane", "last_name": "Doe" } ]
docs.title: Users

docs.text: The Users section provides endpoints for managing user information.
docs.title: Users

docs.text: URL: /users/ Method: GET (List Users), POST (Create User)
docs.title: List and Create Users

docs.text: URL: /api/users/{user_id}/ Method: GET (Retrieve User), PUT (Update User), DELETE (Delete User)
docs.title: Retrieve, Update, and Delete User

docs.text: URL: /api/users/ Method: GET (Retrieve User) Success Responses: [ { "id": 1, "username": "john", "first_name": "John", "last_name": "Doe" }, { "id": 2, "username": "jane", "first_name": "Jane", "last_name": "Doe" } ]
